name: Beat Stack
description:
In this endless color match game your mission is to play as fast as you can to amp up the music; the faster you play, the better the mix. There's 5 different tracks with different play speeds, including techno, dubstep, chiptune and chillout music.

Tap the color of the block with the correct color as fast as you can to score points, grow your stack by sorting correctly and shrink your stack with any wrong matches. The music and world change based on how well you're doing.

Includes Achievements and Leaderboards witn GameCenter!

No longer a solitary experience!
• Games can be played Head to Head for fun or for cold, hard cash (where allowed by law).
• Both players get the same colors in the same order and the player who finishes with the most points win.

Featuring the Skillz Multiplayer platform:
• Challenge people around the world with Skillz, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, Cash or virtual currency prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you for playing!
